text: Anata gata no naka (omoni) mesa rete tsuma o nokosu mono wa, oitate rareru koto naku 1-nenkan fuyo o ukeru yo, tsuma-tachi no tame ni yuigon shinakereba naranai. Daga kano on'na-ra ga dete iki goho-teki ni kodo suru koto ni taishite wa, anata gata ni tsumi wanai. Arra wa iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru
